function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Airborne pathogens from sick person, building, or intentional release","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of dilution method","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of filtration method","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Filter surface adhesion of particles reducing enzyme filter performance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variable susceptibility of pathogens to uvgi based on cell wall presence and thickness","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of relative humidity on uvgi efficiency","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate room air mixing and uneven distribution of uv radiation","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High room relative humidity above 75%","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse health effects of uvgi on humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi system at higher air stream velocities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulation of 'dead' pathogens on contact surface reducing effectiveness of pco method","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Formation of secondary chemical species reducing indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Efficiency of voc removal not confirmed for airborne pathogens.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain impact on human health and air quality of plasmacluster ions technology pci .","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible misuse of essential oils in ventilation industry without proper evaluation.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hypersensitivity reaction of occupants to essential oils","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Toxicity of essential oils to human and microbial cells","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative effects of silver nanoparticles on health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient data on minimum ventilation requirement for public premises","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airflow patterns may contribute to the spread of diseases in occupied volumes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for airborne cross-infection due to low air velocity and disturbance of boundary layer around individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated levels of resuspended particles in the room and within the convection flow","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspended particles brought into the breathing zone of the occupants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resuspended particles of respiratory origin calculated for specific settling velocities and dry density of nonvolatile species in saliva","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Particles of respiratory origin being resuspended from the floor","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of inlet and outlet positions on particle deposition and airflow velocity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Comparison of ventilation supply systems in a hospital environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Downward ventilation may not always protect people from cross-infection due to mixing ventilation and free convection around the human body.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Displacement ventilation performs worse when patients are lying sideways, leading to the persistence of exhalation jets over a long distance.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing the throw of the supply jet from the floor diffuser can deteriorate inhaled air quality and promote resuspension of particles including those carrying respiratory pathogens.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The proximity of people in densely occupied spaces increases the risk of disease transmission by contact and droplet transmission despite the use of dilution ventilation.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of influenza transmission in a built environment with different ventilation systems mixing, underfloor, personalized","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of cross-infection due to unprotected occupants in rooms with personalized ventilation and other ventilation systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence of air supply diffuser performance on user position, angle, clothing insulation, and ambient air temperature.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Draught felt by people at high air flow rates from personalized air supply nozzles.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low velocity personalized ventilation system may not effectively mitigate the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient air distribution indoors","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete knowledge on pathogen transmission","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent information disclosure about the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conflicting political views on pandemic response and impact","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective technical systems for coordinated public policies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear evidence on the best efficiency models for decision-making processes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to take advantage of new technologies for implementing innovative governance models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coordination among different levels of public administrations","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of emerging technologies in early stages","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited open government data projects focused on disaster management","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emphasis on strategic planning processes and the need for strategic alignment may overlook the specific measures needed to mitigate contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Open government mechanisms may not adequately address the specific needs for implementing contagious disease mitigation strategies in strategic planning processes.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on the design of new governance models using emerging technologies ets to incorporate contagious disease mitigation strategies.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Literature search on disaster management and open government projects","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Low"}]}
